Html:
Hi All

Sorry if this is a stupid question, but I am totally new to programming and working on my first project - which is a simple mapping project in C# using this control.

I have followed the instructions in the tutorial, and then I use this line 
gmap.SetCurrentPositionByKeywords("Maputo, Mozambique");
I get the following error.
Error   1   'GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapControl' does not contain a definition for 'SetCurrentPositionByKeywords' and no extension method 'SetCurrentPositionByKeywords' accepting a first argument of type 'GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapControl' could be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) C:\Users\david\Documents\Visual Studio 2013\Projects\TestMap\TestMap\Form1.cs   38  18  TestMap
If I use:
gmap.Position = new PointLatLng(-41.2889, 174.7772);
It works fine.

Has the syntax changed at some point that "SetCurrentPositionByKeywords" no longer works? I really don't want to have to try and convert addresses to lat / long at this stage if I can help it.

Thanks in advance, and thanks to you Radioman for an awesome control.

radioman wrote:
check latest version
I'm using the hot build - 3660acb94e16. Is that not the latest?

OK I figured it out.

The correct syntax is:
gmap.SetPositionByKeywords("Maputo, Mozambique");
Not:
gmap.SetCurrentPositionByKeywords("Maputo, Mozambique");
Thanks!
